flawed_nl_solution:
Malcolm has 240 followers + 500 followers = <<240+500=470>>470 followers on Instagram and Facebook.
He has 470 followers / 2 = <<470/2=235>>235 followers on Twitter.
He has 235 followers x 3 = <<235*3=705>>705 followers on Tiktok.
He has 705 followers + 510 followers = <<705+510=1215>>1215 followers on Youtube.
Altogether, Malcolm has 470 followers + 235 followers + 705 followers + 1215 followers = <<470+235+705+1215=2625>>2625 followers on social media.
#### 2625

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 740, not 470. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
